job_tasks.phrase: Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software engineering activities focused on building and maintaining features and services, including problem-solving.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
job_tasks.justification: This describes end-to-end software development responsibilities, including quality assurance (automation tests) and deployment, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of software, focusing on code quality and business alignment, which are standard software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing technical solutions for integrating with external systems (customer integrations) and communicating technical details, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
job_tasks.justification: This task involves managing the technical implementation and deployment of services for customers, which is an aspect of software integration and project management within a technical context.
This phrase indicates the need to understand and align technical work with the overarching business requirements.

job_tasks.justification: Managing customer projects requires understanding their business context and needs for successful implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
job_tasks.justification: This involves communicating project status and managing stakeholders, which requires understanding the business context and impact of the project.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as design, development, testing, deployment, maintenance, and customer integration. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related technologies. The role also includes aspects of project management and team leadership, but these are within a software engineering context. Therefore, it aligns with the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, which are all within the domain of traditional software engineering. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would suggest a different profile. The absence of any AI/ML related tasks makes the classification straightforward.
